mapper.sql: SELECT faq_id as faqId, employee_id as employeeId, title, content, reg_date as regDate, mod_date as modDate FROM faq
mapper.select: ORDER BY reg_date DESC, faq_id DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM faq WHERE faq_id = #{faq_id} and employee_id = #{employeeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faq(title, content, employee_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{employeeId})
mapper.update: UPDATE faq SET title = #{title}. content = #{content}, mod_date = now() WHERE faq_id = #{faqId} and employee_id = #{employeeId}
